prototype1: Try to capture all the ghosts and reach the finish line.
Stealth is recommended but not required.
prototype2: Use tall grass to sneak or hide from ghosts.
prototype4: If you can't capture the blue ghosts don't worry!
They will respawn if you restart the checkpoint.
prototype6: Pay attetion for the eye below your health bar!
It indicates if you have been detected by any ghosts.
